Sentencas: In this study, the effect of carbonate content on microstructure, relative density, ionic conductivity and fuel cell performance of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9-(Li/Na)(2)CO3 (SDC-carbonate, abbr.
Titulo: Ceria-carbonate composite for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell: Sintering aid and composite effect
Ceria-carbonate composite for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell: Sintering aid and composite effect

Sentencas: With the addition of carbonate, the nanoparticles of ceria are well preserved after heat-treatment.
Titulo: Ceria-carbonate composite for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell: Sintering aid and composite effect

Sentencas: The relative densities of SCC pellets increase as the carbonate content increases or sintering temperature rises.
Titulo: Ceria-carbonate composite for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell: Sintering aid and composite effect

Sentencas: Especially, the relative density of SCC2 sintered at 900 degrees C is higher than that of pure SDC sintered at 1350 degrees C. Both the AC conductivity and DC oxygen ionic conductivity are visibly improved compared with the single phase SDC electrolyte.
Titulo: Ceria-carbonate composite for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell: Sintering aid and composite effect

Sentencas: Among the composites, SDC-20 wt% (Li/Na)(2)CO3 (SCC20) presents high dispersion, relative small particle size, and the dense microstructure.
Titulo: Ceria-carbonate composite for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell: Sintering aid and composite effect

Sentencas: The optimized microstructure brings the best ionic conductivity and fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Ceria-carbonate composite for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell: Sintering aid and composite effect

Sentencas: It is hoped that the results can contribute the understanding of the role of carbonate in the composite materials and highlight their prospective application.
Titulo: Ceria-carbonate composite for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell: Sintering aid and composite effect
